monsters.name: Hound Of The Night
monsters.languages: understands Elvish and Umbral but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Frost Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The hound exhales a 15-foot cone of frost. Those in the area of effect take 44 (8d10) cold damage, or half damage with a successful DC 13 Dexterity saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Blood Scent
special_abilities.desc: A hound of the night can follow a scent through phase shifts, ethereal movement, dimension door, and fey steps of any kind. Teleport and plane shift are beyond their ability to follow.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the hound's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: dimension door

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kongamato makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and the kongamato can't bite another target. When the kongamato moves, any target it is grappling moves with it.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The kongamato doesn't provoke an opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Breaker of Boats
special_abilities.desc: The kongamato deals double damage to objects and structures made of wood or lighter materials.

special_abilities.name: Carry Off
special_abilities.desc: A single kongamato can carry away prey up to 50 lbs, or a single rider under that weight. A grouo of them can carry up to 100 lbs.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider makes two longbow attacks or two claws attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Deadly Precision
special_abilities.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider's ranged attacks do an extra 9 (2d8) damage (included below).

special_abilities.name: Evasive
special_abilities.desc: Ranged weapon attacks against the tosculi elite bow raider have disadvantage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Skirmisher
special_abilities.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider can Dash as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vapor lynx makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The vapor lynx exhales a 40- foot radius poison fog, which heavily obscures a spherical area around the lynx. Any breathing creature that ends its turn in the fog must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1d4 + 1 rounds.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the lynx's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can cast the following spell, requiring no material components:

3/day: gaseous form

special_abilities.name: Smoky Constitution
special_abilities.desc: The vapor lynx spends its time in both gaseous and solid form. Its unique constitution makes it immune to all fog- or gas-related spells and attacks, including its own. A vapor lynx sees clearly through light or heavy obscurement caused by fog, mist, or spells such as fog cloud.
